content: free pattern for a simple double_crochet beanie this easy-to-crochet hat pattern is available in sizes preemie newborn baby toddler child teen and adult each hat is designed to fit the specific size based on head size circumference and height the pattern is written in u s crochet terms and has been fully tested use your favorite medium weight 4 yarn and a 5 5 mm i hook and whip up a few of these hats for your next charity project they make great chemo caps and preemie caps if you are looking for a beautiful yarn to use for sensitive skin please use try an oeko-tex yarn like http //www redheart com/yarn/baby-hugs i hope you find this pattern helpful have fun with your yarn rhondda oombawka design
